name: NAKED Collection - Virgin Indian Straight (MachineWefted)
description:
Lush Hair Imports is proud to present the NAKED Collection!

This coveted collection consists of Virgin Indian Hair imported directly from India. Our NAKED hair ranges from 12" to 30" of the purest hair on the market and is finally available to you! 

Our Virgin Indian Straight Hair is very low maintenance. All Indian hair is in its natural form and comes between a 1B-2 color. Our NAKED Straight texture can be worn multiple ways! All of our hair is tangle free and easy to manage. This hair also flat-irons perfectly maintaining a smooth and beautiful straight style. Each bundle contains approximately 3.5 ~ 4 oz of hair.

name: NAKED Collection - Virgin Indian Wavy (MachineWefted)
description:
Lush Hair Imports is proud to present the NAKED Collection!

This coveted collection consists of Virgin Indian Hair imported directly from India. Our NAKED hair ranges from 12" to 30" of the purest hair on the market and is finally available to you! 

Our Virgin Indian Wavy Hair is our classic texture! All Indian hair is in its natural form and comes between a 1B-2 color. Our NAKED Wavy texture can be worn multiple ways! All of our hair is tangle free and easy to manage. This hair also flat-irons perfectly maintaining a smooth and beautiful straight style. Each bundle contains approximately 3.5 ~ 4 oz of hair.

name: Ombré Hair Color
description: Get the technique that you see on our client Azealia Banks! The hottest hair trend in color that fades from dark to light from the root to the tips of your Virgin Hair Extensions. All color services are performed by Celebrity Hair Stylist Brianna.

name: NAKED Collection - Virgin Indian Curly (MachineWefted)
description:
Lush Hair Imports is proud to present the NAKED Collection!

This coveted collection consists of Virgin Indian Hair imported directly from India. Our NAKED hair ranges from 12" to 30" of the purest hair on the market and is finally available to you! 

Our Natural Curly Hair is in HIGH DEMAND due to the rarity of its texture! All Indian hair is in its natural form and comes between a 1B-2 color. Experience the beauty of our NAKED Curly Texture. This hair can be worn in one length or in layers. The natural curl pattern makes this hair care-free and bouncy. This hair also flat-irons perfectly maintaining a smooth and beautiful straight style. Each bundle contains approximately 3.5 ~ 4 oz of hair.

name: Custom Virgin Indian Lace Closure
description:
Our Virgin Indian Lace Closures are 100% custom! You choose the color of your lace and hair texture. You set the standards, and we begin working on your custom closure immediately!

Since all of our lace closures are 100% custom, the time frame for manufacturing is 5 - 7 days. Once the lace closure is completed (within 5 - 7 days), your order will be shipped!

name: Gift Card
description:
Give the gift of choice! Purchase e-gift cards to our Hair Boutique/Salon and let your loved ones get what they REALLY want. Our gift cards are electronic and can be used online or in-store. 

Choose between our luxurious imported Virgin Indian Hair textures from our NAKED Collection or Salon Services including sew-in hair extensions.

name: Brazilian Blowout Shampoo and Conditioner Set
description: Brazilian Blowout Açai Hair Care Kit is an aftercare product regimen developed for the sole purpose of extending the life of the Brazilian Blowout Professional Smoothing Treatments.

name: Brazilian Blowout Shampoo
description: An exclusive, sulfate-free cleansing shampoo that extends the life of the Brazilian Blowout by maintaining the vital moisture and protein balance needed for optimal smoothness and radiant, frizz-free hair.

name: Brazilian Blowout Conditioner
description: The BEST conditioner to prolong your Brazilian Blowout!

name: Joico Moisture Recovery Shampoo and Conditioner Set
description: The Joico Moisture Recovery shampoo contains bio-mimetic peptides, marine botanicals and seawater nutrients to actually put moisture in and heal your hair. The conditioner contains marine botanicals, brown algae and sea kelp that continue to feed your hair and make it FRIZZ FREE!

name: Joico Color Endure Shampoo and Conditioner Set
description: Sulfate-free Color Endure keeps color true to hue with our triple-threat Multi-spectrum Defense Complex,TM a mega complex of fade-defying Green Tea, antioxidants and UV protectors that fight both the physical and environmental factors that can cause fading and tonal change.

name: Joico Color Therapy Shampoo and Conditioner Set
description:
Shampoo:

•A gentle color-protecting shampoo for weak or multi-processed hair.

•Provides a dense, cushiony lather that rinses away easily, helping to prevent tangles and protect hair fibers.

•This rich shampoo will significantly improve your color rentention, add shine and smoothness, and tame your flyaway hair.
 
Conditioner:

•A rich color-protecting conditioner for damaged or multi-processed hair.

•Argan Oil reduces styling time by providing a smooth surface that remains light and moveable and increases ease of wet/dry combing, reducing mechanical hair damage.

•Nourishes and hydrates damaged, color-treated or over-processed hair, giving your hair shine, movement and an improved responsiveness to styling.

name: Wella Professionals Enrich Shampoo and Conditioner Set
description:
Restore and protect your hair with Wella Professionals Enrich Moisturizing Shampoo For Coarse Hair. Containing natural silk extract, dry and unruly locks are left feeling soft, smooth and easy to manage.

An intensely rich formula, Wella Professionals Enrich Moisturizing Shampoo For Coarse Hair nourishes thick, unmanageable hair to leave it irresistible to the touch. Containing rejuvenating Shea Butter, unruly hair is transformed into luscious, silky locks that are full of vitality.

name: Wella Professionals Brilliance Shampoo and Conditioner Set
DermOrganic Argan Oil
description:
The Original! DermOrganic Leave-In Treatment is made with Certified Argan Oil of Morocco to repair, protect and improve hair shine. Restores optimal moisture balance, smoothes and softens, speeds drying time, and protects hair from thermal styling 

-Adds incredible softness and shine 
-Protects hair from thermal damage 
-Speeds drying time up to 40% 
-Restores optimal moisture 
-Revitalizes and repairs 
-Seals cuticle & protects color
-Smoothes and softens
-Enriched with Omega-6, Lipids, Antioxidants, Vitamin E and Natural Moisture Factors 
-Made with Certified Argan Oil of Morocco 

Directions for Virgin Indian Hair: Work a few drops into clean hair before styling to repair, protect and seal in shine. Use as a final touch finishing product.

Ingredients: Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethicone, Organic Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil, Organic Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Organic Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Extract, Glycereth-2 Cocoate/Benzoic Acid,Parfum/Fragrance

name: BioSilk Silk Therapy
description:
BioSilk is a product that conditions and hydrates hair and skin instantly. This product provides volume and body while controlling and defining curls. It reconstructs and repairs dry, damaged hair and skin. BioSilk also smooths the cuticle and controls frizz with no flyaways. It is a product to stop hair breakage by sealing the hair in its place. 

The color of your hair will not fade neither will it die out from environmental damage. Thermal protection is guaranteed from blow drying and flat/curl ironing. It is sure to leave your hair and skin soft and silky with an unbelievable shine.

name: Lush Tee
description: Show your support and purchase a Lush T-Shirt!
